casebody.data:
IN RE: A.P. 145PA17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 12, 2018 Anne C. Wright, Attorney at Law, Boone, for Powell, Kylah Christopher C. Peace, Attorney at Law, Keith T. Roberson, Attorney at Law, for Mecklenburg County DSS Matthew Wunsche, Attorney at Law, Durham, for GAL

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of September 2018 by Guardian ad Litem for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th of September 2018."
